page.title: 07Education Pot Kiln School
page.content: n 1980 at Pot Kiln School,the water in he swimming pool kept disappearing. This was because of a big crack in the bottom of the pool,so they filled it up but an even bigger crack appeared.The water ran away again so they gave it up again.We came out to play on our playground and found that it had dipped in the middle.We were taken in and the council were called and they came and drilled holes in the ground and lowered small cameras down.They found some disused chalk mines underneath which had to be filled up so some of the school were moved into Wells Hall Old School.The holes took about a year to be filled and now it is all finished and is safe.
